full_threads.body:
HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Begin forwarded message:


From: "Michelle Mowbray" <michelle@readytoread.com.au>

Subject: RE: Bridge to School

Date: 29 March 2018 at 3:24:05 pm AEDT

To: "'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ'" <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Cc: "'David Mowbray'" <david@readytoread.com.au>


Hi Heath

Just checking if ENT Care and/or the dentistry place have provided any content as per below?

Thanks

Michelle

From: Michelle Mowbray [mailto:michelle@readytoread.com.au]
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2018 2:16 PM
To: 'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: 'David Mowbray' <david@readytoread.com.au>
Subject: RE: Bridge to School

Hi Heath

Here are the articles – I’m yet to edit them, but it will give you a fair idea. I’ll definitely be condensing the physio article. I’ll also use the article we placed on our website, one more compelling article about the importance of early literacy (around 600 words) and I’m waiting on two others – one about child care and one about swimming. Do you think four pages would be sufficient for the first edition? I anticipate that the front page would also be content-rich.

With regards to speaking with your contacts below, we would certainly like to source content from them for the second edition rather than the first edition given timing and space; but for this first edition do you think ENT Care and the Dentistry place would be interested in contributing something very short? For dentistry it could be ‘5 tips for sending your child to school with top oral health’; and for ENT it could be a definition to de-mystify a concept, e.g. ‘What is a grommet?’

Below is a snapshot of how we’re communicating the concept so you have talking points. I’m also highlighting to everyone that we need the content by next week so we can edit, design and print in time for 18 April pop-up library!

We’re bringing together content for our new publication, Bridge to School, which will be sent as an e-blast to our own mailing lists, as well as printed and distributed via child care centres, our own locations across Sydney and at our pop-up children’s libraries (the next two are planned for the Entertainment Quarter in Moore Park mid-April and the Pregnancy, Babies and Children’s Expo in May).

The first edition will include content from a variety of specialty areas including literacy, speech pathology, physiotherapy, education and child care, to give parents the information they need to know in order to help their children prepare for school. Future editions will include content from allied health professionals.

Thanks

Michelle

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Tuesday, March 20, 2018 6:22 PM
To: Michelle Mowbray <michelle@readytoread.com.au>
Cc: David Mowbray <david@readytoread.com.au>
Subject: Re: Bridge to School

Great thanks Michelle,

Can you please send them through so that when we do the mock up we can gauge the length etc?

Also, regarding the pricing for these, we will do the First Edition (how cool does that sound!) for $44/page. This basically covers our labour costs as I know this is a loss leader exercise for you guys. We can do the logo for $440 inc GST.

Let me know if we are clear to proceed and also, as mentioned, feel free to send through some information that I can forward to the specialists below to see if they are interested in writing an article:

  • https://annandaledental.com.au/ - Dentist
  • https://hillsent.com.au/ - ENT
  • https://northsideaudiology.com.au/ - Audiologist
  • https://entcaresydney.com.au/ - ENT

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

On 20 Mar 2018, at 3:35 pm, Michelle Mowbray <michelle@readytoread.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath

Just letting you know that I now have three more articles for our Bridge to School publication! I’m working on a couple more.

Will keep you posted on developments.

Thanks

Michelle

<image002.jpg>

Michelle Mowbray
Director, Marketing & Engagement
P: 0403 258 215 | E: michelle@readytoread.com.au | W: readytoread.com.au
Building the foundation for a lifetime of learning
